subtitles.text: Good evening everyone listening to JWave Wow Music.

Each month, one creator navigates the show as a monthly presenter, introducing a piece of music that he or she thinks is amazing, and then we have a late night music discussion with the creator of the amazing music!
May's monthly presenter is History's Mr. Ikeda.
I've been a guest before, so I've already taken the liberty of doing so.
Yes, I hope I can speak freely and openly.
Today, I would like to welcome Mr. Taihisa Okazaki as our guest for a late-night music discussion.
Actually, we seem to be very close to each other, but this is the first time we've had a proper talk.
So I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm not sure if we'll have enough time for one hour, but I'd like to talk about a lot of things.
I'm not sure if an hour will be enough, but I'd like to talk about many things.
I'm not sure if I'll have enough time for one hour.
Mm-hmm.
Mnh-mnh.
I don't know if one hour is enough.
